ResistanceFeature.Name: Ring of Warmth
ResistanceFeature.Text: While wearing this ring, you have resistance to cold damage. In addition, you and everything you wear and carry are unharmed by temperatures as low as −50 degrees Fahrenheit.

MagicProperty.Name: Ring of Warmth
MagicProperty.Description: While wearing this ring, you have resistance to cold damage. In addition, you and everything you wear and carry are unharmed by temperatures as low as −50 degrees Fahrenheit.
